name: A Legacy For Alaric
description:
A Legacy For Alaric is a single player, fantasy, text adventure in which the player takes the role of a young lad who's a member of The Adventurer's Guild. It seems that the wizard Emril is dying of old age and wants to pass on his legacy to his nephew Alaric. The problem is that Alaric is being held prisoner in an island castle on lake Moira. That's the task - the reward is 10% of the legacy (less guild fees of 70%), off you go.

The game marks the player's progress by awarding points after key events, the full game scores one hundred and fifty points. Making a bad decision ends the game requiring the player to start again.

This story is continued in The Magic Isle which was released separately, in some compilations the two are released as a combined game with A Legacy For Alaric being Part One and The Magic Isle being Part Two.

shot.caption: Some versions of the game combine parts one and two
The game starts with the young adventurer being late on their first day, luckily adventurers aren't known for their punctuality
The game gets underway. It's not until the cart stops that we find out just what task has been set
The player has found details of the task which are key to the storyAt key events like this the player is rewarded with points
If the player quits, or makes a bad decision, the game ends and they are given an option to replay
